meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>product</kanji>'s <kanji>quality</kanji> is in its <vocabulary>material quality</vocabulary>. If the materials aren't any good then the product isn't either.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
